EmailTemplate.name: ProSeries-Followup-UnabletoContact
EmailTemplate.subject: ProSeries-Followup-UnabletoContact
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Intuit - ProSeries Tax
Hi {!Contact.Name},
We just got some new pricing for new customers you’ll want to hear about, but I haven’t had much luck getting in touch with you.
Give me a call and I can give you all the details. My direct number is {!User.Phone}
If you are no longer interested in ProSeries, let me know that too. You can just reply to this email letting me know:
I’m still considering ProSeries, give me a call. I’m no longer interested in ProSeries for tax season 2013. I’m not interested this year, but would like to consider it next year, keep me in your records.
Best wishes for a profitable and productive tax season!
Sincerely, {!User.Name}
We have a new customer program that guarantees you’ll be season-ready on ProSeries in 30 days.
IMPORTANT: Intuit respects the personal nature of email communication. Every effort is made to offer only information that may be of value to you or your business. If you do not wish to receive marketing email from Intuit in the future, please click here.
If you have any questions or comments, please DO NOT REPLY to this email. Contact Customer Service at 800.765.7777 for assistance. If you receive an email message that appears to come from Intuit but that you suspect is a phishing email, please forward it immediately to spoof@intuit.com. Please visit http://security.intuit.com for additional security information.

Intuit Inc., Customer Communications, 2800 E. Commerce Center Place, Tucson, AZ 85706
